thread.title: Westar Energy schedules conference call to discuss 2017 results

author: cnbc.com
title: Westar Energy schedules conference call to discuss 2017 results
text:
TOPEKA, Kan., Feb. 05, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- On Feb. 21, 2018, Westar Energy, Inc. (NYSE:WR) plans to release year end 2017 results after market close. On Thursday, Feb. 22, 2018, the company plans to host its quarterly conference call and audio webcast to discuss the results.
Event: Westar Energy Year End 2017 Conference Call and Webcast
Date: Feb. 22, 2018
Time: 10 a.m. Eastern (9 a.m. Central)
Location: 1) Phone conference call at 844-646-4526, conference ID 8299426, or
2) Log on to the webcast at http://WestarEnergy.com
In conjunction with the earnings release and conference call, the company plans to post on its website supplemental financial information related to fourth-quarter and year end 2017 performance. The materials will be available under Supplemental Materials in the Investors section of the company website at http://WestarEnergy.com .
A replay of the conference call will be available from about 1 p.m. Eastern Feb. 22 through March 1, 2018, at 855-859-2056, conference ID 8299426. The replay will be available on the Westar Energy website at http://WestarEnergy.com .
As Kansasâ€™ largest electric utility, Westar Energy, Inc. (NYSE:WR) provides customers the safe, reliable electricity needed to power their businesses and homes. We have 7,800 MW of electric generation capacity that includes renewables and traditional power sources with half the electricity supplied to our more than 700,000 customers from emissions free sources: nuclear, wind and solar, with a third coming from renewables. We are a leader in electric transmission in Kansas coordinating a network of lines and substations that supports one of the largest consolidations of wind energy in the nation. Our employees live, volunteer and work in the communities we serve.
For more information about Westar Energy, visit us on the Internet at http://www.WestarEnergy.com .
